landingPageDescription: Transform your ride history into stunning, interactive visualizations. Uncover insights and patterns in your travel history with privacy-first analytics.
thisUsuallyTakesAFewSeconds: This usually takes a few seconds
diveDeep: Dive deep into your data with our comprehensive suite of analytics tools.
interactiveMapDescription: Visualize every trip on a global map. Filter by date, time, and type to see where you've been.
deepAnalyticsDescription: Break down your spending, distance traveled, and time spent in rides with detailed charts.
timePatternsDescription: Discover your most frequent travel times and seasonal habits to optimize your schedule.
streaksDescription: Analyze your longest streaks and the time between rides to understand your usage patterns.
costEfficiencyDescription: See how much you're spending per mile and minute to make smarter travel decisions.
exportDataDescription: Download your processed data or export trips to KML for use in other applications.
